title: Spring vegetable salad
description: Add some texture to a simple salad with crunchy spring vegetables. Serve with homemade dressing and garlic bread for a healthy light lunch. This meal is low calorie and provides 296 kcal, 13.2g protein, 38.9g carbohydrate (of which 7.2g sugars), 9.2g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 8.4g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 courgettes, cut into long, thin ribbons
